input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine

Item specifications:
Help Princess Sofia pass the Princess Test by helping her with her princess posture!
Roll the mini figure forward and watch her really balance a book atop her head
Also comes with a book she can "hold" in her hand and a purple backpack
Inspired by Disney Jr's Sofia the First
Collect all the dolls in the assortment to build a world of imaginative play
Ages 3 and older.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine. Roll the mini figure forward and watch her balance a book atop her head! This item is inspired by Disney Jr's Sofia the First and comes with a book she can "hold" in her hand, a purple backpack, and will help Princess Sofia pass the Princess Test by helping her with her princess posture! Collect all the dolls in the assortment to build a world of imaginative play. 
Ages 3 and older.
input_text.Response B: Roll into fun with the Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine! Inspired by Disney Jr's Sofia the First, this mini figure helps Princess Sofia pass the Princess Test by helping her with her princess posture! Roll the mini figure forward and watch her really balance a book atop her head. She also comes with a book she can "hold" in her hand and a purple backpack. Collect all the dolls in the assortment to build a world of imaginative play. Ages: 3+.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
